sentences.cn: 用来做汉堡包的圆面包
一个黏糊糊的小圆甜点心

sentences.en: Grace had long straight dark hair which she wore in a bun.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯把一头长长的黑色直发盘成发髻。

sentences.en: He chewed his bun as he hated it.
sentences.cn: 他狠狠嚼着面包,象是把面包当成冤家似的.

sentences.en: He kept drinking till he got a bun on.
sentences.cn: 他不停地喝酒,一直到醉.

sentences.en: He nibbled his own bun as though he grudged it to himself.
sentences.cn: 他一小点、一小点地啃着面包,好象舍不得给自己吃一样.

sentences.en: Her hair, also as usual, had escaped from its bun.
sentences.cn: 她的头发也象往常一样, 从发髻里松了下来.

sentences.en: Her wiry hair was pushed up on top of her head in an untidy bun.
sentences.cn: 她粗硬的头发向上梳起，在头顶乱糟糟地盘成了个发髻。

sentences.en: I had a cup of tea and a bun at four o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我在四点钟时喝了一杯茶,吃了个小甜面包.

sentences.en: John, I've something to tell you. I've a bun in the oven.
sentences.cn: 约翰, 我有事要告诉你, 我有喜了.

sentences.en: She had her fair hair done up in a bun.
sentences.cn: 她把自己漂亮的头发做成了个圆髻.

sentences.en: She had pale thin yellow hair she pulled back into a bun.
sentences.cn: 她把一头稀疏的浅黄色头发向后梳，挽成了个圆髻。

sentences.en: She tied her hair in ( to ) a bun.
sentences.cn: 她把头发挽成个 髻.

sentences.en: She was sitting at the kitchen table eating a currant bun.
sentences.cn: 她正坐在餐桌旁，吃着葡萄干圆面包。

sentences.en: She wore her hair in a bun.
She wore her hair in a bun.

phrases.phrase: have a bun in the oven

trans.tran_cn: 圆形的小面包或点心，（女子的）圆发髻，酒宴，闹饮，〈英方〉尾巴
